title: What have you been conserving?
author: VD
content_html: As John Red Eagle and I lay out in a fair amount of detail in CUCKSERVATIVE: HOW “CONSERVATIVES” BETRAYED AMERICA, the conservative movement was doomed to failure from the start, being more of a defensive political posture than a coherent ideology with specific objectives or a consistent philosophy. The book also features the cartoons of Red Meat; this is a brand new one from him.
content_text:
As John Red Eagle and I lay out in a fair amount of detail in
CUCKSERVATIVE: HOW “CONSERVATIVES” BETRAYED AMERICA
, the conservative movement was doomed to failure from the start, being more of a defensive political posture than a coherent ideology with specific objectives or a consistent philosophy. The book also features the cartoons of Red Meat; this is a brand new one from him.
